normal.name: Tackle
normal.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

normal.name: Quick Attack
normal.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible.

normal.name: Take Down
normal.description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. It also slightly increases the user's attack.

normal.name: Hyper Beam
normal.description: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can't move on the next turn.

normal.name: Giant Claw
normal.description: The user slashes the target with huge, sharp claws.

normal.name: Scream of Pain
normal.description: The user attacks the target with a horrible sound wave. It may also lower the target's defense and confuse it.

normal.name: Comet Punch
normal.description: The user throws a flurry of punches that strike the target.

normal.name: Double Team
normal.description: The user creates illusory copies of itself to confuse the target.

grass.name: Razor Leaf
grass.description: Sharp edged leaves are launched to slash at the opponent.

grass.name: Vine Whip
grass.description: A whip-like vine is used to lash the opponent. It may also lower the target's defense.

grass.name: Grass Touch
grass.description: The monster touches the target with its leafy arms and cuts it with sharp thorns.

grass.name: Grass Punch
grass.description: The target is punched with a leafy fist. It may also lower the target's defense.

grass.name: Grass Cannon
grass.description: The monster fires a grassy cannon at the target. It may also lower the target's defense.

grass.name: Grass Claw
grass.description: The user slashes the target with huge, sharp claws. It may also lower the target's attack.

grass.name: Green Ray
grass.description: The user attacks the target with a green ray. It may also lower the target's defense.

grass.name: Leafy Cannon
grass.description: The user attacks with a cannon of leaves. It may also lower the target's defense.

grass.name: Tree Slap
grass.description: The user slaps the target with a tree branch. It may also make the target confused.

fire.name: Ember
fire.description: The target is attacked with small flames.

fire.name: Flamethrower
fire.description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire.

fire.name: Fire Punch
fire.description: The target is punched with a fiery fist. It may also leave the target with a burn.

fire.name: Fire Blast
fire.description: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.

fire.name: Fire Rush
fire.description: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.

fire.name: Burning Rage
fire.description: The user attacks the target with a firey rage. It may also leave the target with a burn.

fire.name: Blazing Fist
fire.description: The user slams the target with a fist made of fire. It may also lower the target's defense.

fire.name: Fire Tornado
fire.description: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire tornado. It may also leave the target with a burn.

fire.name: Fire Cannon
fire.description: The user shoots a fireball at the target. It may also lower the target's defense.

water.name: Water Gun
water.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

water.name: Hydro Pump
water.description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

water.name: Aqua Tail
water.description: The monster attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

water.name: Waterfall
water.description: The target is hit with a giant wave of water crashing down from above.

water.name: Surf
water.description: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave. It may also lower the targets' accuracy.

water.name: Aqua Bomb
water.description: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.

water.name: Water Pulse
water.description: The target is attacked with a pulsing blast of water. It may also confuse the target.

water.name: Water Blast
water.description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure. It may also confuse the target.

water.name: Aqua Jet
water.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible.

water.name: Aqua Fist
water.description: The user slams the target with a water fist. It may also lower the target's defense.

water.name: Brine
water.description: If the target's HP is down to about half, this attack will hit with double the power.

water.name: Clamp
water.description: The target is clamped and squeezed by the user's very thick and sturdy shell. It may increase the user's defense.

water.name: Crabhammer
water.description: The user hits the target with a pincer attack.

electric.name: Thunder Shock
electric.description: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

electric.name: Electric Surge
electric.description: The monster releases a powerful electric surge that damages the target and may lower its speed.

electric.name: Thunderbolt
electric.description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

electric.name: Thunder Punch
electric.description: The target is punched with an electrified fist. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

electric.name: Thunder Shock
electric.description: The target is jolted with a jolt of electricity. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

electric.name: Thunder
electric.description: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

electric.name: Thunder Punch
electric.description: The target is punched with an electrified fist. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

electric.name: Thunder Wave
electric.description: The target is hit by a weak jolt of electricity. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

electric.name: Charge Beam
electric.description: The user attacks with an electric charge. The target may be left with paralysis.

electric.name: Discharge
electric.description: The user strikes everything around it by letting loose a flare of electricity. It may also leave those it hits with paralysis.

psychic.name: Psybeam
psychic.description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. It may also cause confusion.

psychic.name: Psycho Cut
psychic.description: The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. The target may also become confused.

psychic.name: Psycho Blast
psychic.description: The user attacks the target with a powerful psychic blast. It may also make the target fall asleep.

psychic.name: Psycho Edge
psychic.description: The user attacks with a blade of psychic energy. The user may also confuse the target.

ice.name: Ice Beam
ice.description: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It may also freeze the target solid.

ice.name: Frost Breath
ice.description: The monster exhales a freezing-cold breath that may freeze the target.

ice.name: Ice Punch
ice.description: The target is punched with an icy fist. It may also leave the target frozen.

ice.name: Ice Beam
ice.description: A beam of ice is launched at the target. It may also leave the target frozen.

ice.name: Blizzard
ice.description: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike the target. It may also leave the target frozen.

ice.name: Blizzard Blast
ice.description: A blast of freezing cold air is blown at the target. It may also leave the target frozen.

ground.name: Earthquake
ground.description: The monster sets off an earthquake that strikes every monster around it.

ground.name: Mud-Slap
ground.description: The target is hit with a sludge-filled attack. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

ground.name: Ground Rush
ground.description: The user rushes the target at breakneck speed. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

ground.name: Earthy Fist
ground.description: The user slams the target with a fist made of earth. It may also lower the target's defense.

ground.name: Earthy Cannon
ground.description: The user attacks with a cannon of earth. It may also lower the target's defense.

ground.name: Ground Slap
ground.description: The user slaps the target with its open palm. It may also lower the target's defense and make it confused.

ground.name: Tunnel Retreat
ground.description: The user digs a hole and retreats into it to heal. It may also increase the user's defense.

ghost.name: Shadow Ball
ghost.description: The monster hurls a shadowy blob at the target. It may also lower the target's defense.

ghost.name: Shadow Sneak
ghost.description: The monster sneaks up on the target from behind and strikes it with a shadowy force.

ghost.name: Shadow Punch
ghost.description: The target is punched with a fist wrapped in shadows. It may also lower the target's attack.

ghost.name: Astonish
ghost.description: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. It may also make the target confused.

ghost.name: Confuse Ray
ghost.description: A sinister ray that induces confusion in the target.

poison.name: Toxic Spray
poison.description: The monster sprays a toxic substance on the target, which gradually poisons it.

poison.name: Sludge
poison.description: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy sludge. It may also poison the target.

poison.name: Sludge Bomb
poison.description: The target is hit with a bomb filled with a filthy sludge. It may also poison the target.

poison.name: Poison Fang
poison.description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may also poison the target.

flying.name: Flying Kick
flying.description: The monster kicks the target with a flying kick. It may also lower the target's defense.

flying.name: Air Ray
flying.description: The user attacks the target with a gust of wind. It may also raise the user's attack.

flying.name: Aerial Ace
flying.description: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes.

flying.name: Air Cutter
flying.description: The target is sliced with a scythe-like wind.

flying.name: Air Slash
flying.description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. It may also make the target confused.

flying.name: Flying Slash
flying.description: The user slashes the target with a flying blade. It may also raise the user's attack.

flying.name: Fly Wing
flying.description: The user flys at the target with its wings. It may also make the target confused.

flying.name: Wings of Chaos
flying.description: The user flies around the target and hits it with its wings. It may lower the target's defense.

steel.name: Steel Kick
steel.description: The monster kicks the target with a steel-hard foot.

steel.name: Steel Fist
steel.description: The user slams the target with a steel fist. It may also raise the user's defense.

steel.name: Gold Rush
steel.description: The user attacks the target with a flurry of gold coins.

steel.name: Iron Shield
steel.description: The user protects itself with a hard shell and raises its defense.

fairy.name: Fair Wind
fairy.description: The monster summons a fair wind that damages the target and lowers its speed.

fairy.name: Fairy Yell
fairy.description: The user starts yelling at the target in a high-pitched voice. It may also lower the target's attack.

fairy.name: Fairy Ray
fairy.description: The user shoots a ray of light at the target. It may also lower the target's defense and make it confused.

fairy.name: Fairy Spin
fairy.description: The user spins around and creates a whirlwind that hits the target. It may make the enemy fall asleep.

dark.name: Bite
dark.description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs.

dark.name: Crunch
dark.description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may also lower the target's defense.

dark.name: Crunch Punch
dark.description: The user throws a punch with the power to shatter a rock. It may also lower the target's defense.

dark.name: Dark Pulse
dark.description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. It may also make the target confused.

dark.name: Dark Void
dark.description: The user lets loose a pitch-black shock wave at the target. It may also make the target confused.

dragon.name: Dragon Breath
dragon.description: The target is attacked with an intense blast of hot breath. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

dragon.name: Dragon Claw
dragon.description: The target is slashed with huge, sharp claws. It may also lower the target's defense.

dragon.name: Dragon Pulse
dragon.description: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

dragon.name: Dragon Rush
dragon.description: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, or the like to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

dragon.name: Draco Meteor
dragon.description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. It may also lower the target's defense.

dragon.name: Twister
dragon.description: The target is attacked with a fierce whirlwind that may also make the target's defense fall.

dragon.name: Draco Punch
dragon.description: The user gathers all its power and slams the target with its punch. It may also lower the target's defense.

dragon.name: Dragon Smash
dragon.description: The user slams the target with its tail. It may also lower the target's defense.

dragon.name: Dragon Dance
dragon.description: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that boosts its attack and defense.

dragon.name: Dragon Strike
dragon.description: The monster strikes the target with a fierce blow.

dragon.name: Dragon Bite
dragon.description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs.

dragon.name: Dragon Wave
dragon.description: The target is hit with a shock wave generated by a dragon's roar. It may also lower the target's defense.

rock.name: Ancient Power
rock.description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. It may also raise the user's defense.

rock.name: Salt Blast
rock.description: The user gets salty and blasts the target with salt. It may also leave the target confused.

rock.name: Candy Crush
rock.description: The user crushes the target with a candy cane from Reuters Kiosk. It may also lower the target's defense.

rock.name: Meteor Smash
rock.description: The user creates a meteor and smashes it into the target.

bug.name: Insect Bite
bug.description: The user bites the target. It may also poison the target.

bug.name: Bug Buzz
bug.description: The user generates a damaging sound wave by vigorously shaking its body.

bug.name: Insect Wave
bug.description: The user attacks with a wave of insects. It may poison the target.

fighting.name: Brick Break
fighting.description: The user attacks with a swift chop.

fighting.name: Cross Chop
fighting.description: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. It may also lower the target's defense.

fighting.name: Defend Order
fighting.description: The user focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its defense.

fighting.name: Double Kick
fighting.description: The user delivers two kicks in a row. It may also lower the target's defense.

fighting.name: Double Slap
fighting.description: The user slaps the target with its open palm two to five times in a row.

fighting.name: Kick
fighting.description: The target is attacked with a kick launched with muscle-packed power.

fighting.name: Roundhouse Kick
fighting.description: The target is hit with a kick launched with muscle-packed power.

fighting.name: One Punch
fighting.description: The target is hit with an focused punch. It may also lower the target's defense.

fighting.name: Pimp Slap
fighting.description: The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.
